item.description:
At this meeting, we'll take a look at Xmod Pro by Kelly Ford over at dnndev.com.

Xmod Pro has been around for many years and is a mature and well though out module for creating custom DNN forms and displays. Think of it as a swiss army knife for interfacing with data and tables (forms), and presenting that data in a flexible manner (templated display).

We will also have roundtable discussion for DNN issues, questions or topics. This includes anything that you might want to ask, inform, or present to the group in a discussion style format.

Hope to see you at the meeting!
item.name: DotNetNuke Boston User Group
